titles.title: A resolution recognizing the 30th anniversary of the United States Holocaust Memorial Museum.
A resolution recognizing the 30th anniversary of the United States Holocaust Memorial Museum.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: War crimes, genocide, crimes against humanity

bill.summary: This resolution congratulates those responsible for the creation of the U.S. Holocaust Memorial Museum, condemns antisemitism, supports educational and community-based programs that counter antisemitism and hate, and designates April 26, 2023, as United States Holocaust Memorial Museum Day.
